resources.string: Java is object oriented programming language
Android is not linux based operting system
Scroll view can contain only one view, or view group, as a child.
AlertDialog: The most suggested dialog box, the AlertDialog supports 0-3 buttons, along with a list of selectable items, such as radio buttons and checkboxes.
ProgressDialog: Used to display a progress bar and is an extension of the AlertDIalog. It also supports the addition of buttons.
Content Providers not To share data between applications
Intent does not perform inter-connection between activities and mechanisms that pass on data
SharedPreference option stores data in XML files.
External Storage stores data in the file system but it can be accessed to all apps in the device
Internal Storage does not stores data in the device file system where it cannot be read by other applications
